name: Final Fantasy 2
description:
Final Fantasy 2 is a RPG game developed by Square. It was originally released in 1988. Square published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Final Fantasy 2 is available on PlayStation, PSP and iOS.
It was produced by Masafumi Miyamoto. Hironobu Sakaguchi directed the game. It was scored by Nobuo Uematsu.
